str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Pilate. Of Latin origin; close-pressed, i.e. Firm; Pilatus, a Roman.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To interrogate, question, demand of. From epi and erotao; to ask for, i.e. Inquire, seek.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A Galilean, an inhabitant of Galilee. From Galilaia; Galilean or belonging to Galilea.
